titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing copies of three letters regarding the inferior quality of the sulphur most recently shipped from Bushire to Bombay. The enclosed letters are:Letter from Edward Hutchins Bellasis, Secretary of the Military Board, to Francis Warden, dated 10 February 1816, describing the poor quality and damage of recent sulphur shipments.Letter from James Inverarity, Agent for Gunpowder, to Edward Hutchins Bellasis, dated 13 January 1816, reporting said damage.Letter from James Inverarity, Agent for Gunpowder, to Edward Hutchins Bellasis, dated 15 February 1816, confirming that he has sold some of the damaged sulphur.
